data.title: Stops You Can't Afford To Miss On Chandigarh Shimla Highway
data.meta_description: Here we are the absolute ‘must’ halts that you need to stop over while you’re en route Kasauli or Shimla
data.text:
TIMBER TRAIL RESORT

This is literally the first place you end up seeing when the initial hills start coming around and since Timber Trail has been there since quite a time and that too with an exceptionally good word of mouth, it’s usually jam-packed. An aesthetically done outdoor deck, amidst the placid hills that serves multi-cuisine, makes for a really pleasant and delightful time with your family and friends. Where: Parwanoo. Meal for two: Rs 1000

ISHAR SWEETS

Now, as the name suggests, this one is especially for the dessert lovers! Ishar Sweets has a reputation of its own, especially for its malai kulfi, its nothing less than a taste of heaven, you just can’t pass by without stopping and devouring into its chatpata delights like some hot and piping samosas, kachori, aloo tikkis….*dreamyyy*!! Where: Sohan Nagar, Kalka. Meal for two: Rs300

CHACHU DA DHABA

If you’re going via the Barog route, this one gem you just have to discover! The food is phenomenal and their specialty ‘Gur Ka Parantha’ is to die for! Everything from the food to service to the whole vibe of the place speaks volume of love and warmth and hence, this hidden yet extraordinary Dhaba needs to be on your checklist!!! Where: 22, MDR9, Barog. Meal for two: Rs 400

KENWOOD RESORTS

As they say, ‘Old is Gold’ and one such fine example of it would be the Kenwood resorts. Been there innumerable times and never once had an unpleasant experience. The food was and still continues to be delightful and luscious. The staff being courteous ensures that whosoever visits don’t head out without a satiating smile on their faces. Also, there happens to be a well-stocked bar that further ups their game. So, this place has a little something for everyone, go fuel up your young hearts and devour their scrumptious delicacies, We promise this will be amongst your favorites too!! Where: NH22, Jabli, Solan. Meal for two: Rs 1000

DHARAMPUR HAVELI

We Punjabis love our food, it's no hidden fact, right? And so we need and therefore try to find our soul food no matter where we go and catering exactly to that is the Dharampur Haveli that gives you your sheer authentic Punjabi Khanna and to add more to that, the rustic vibes, the humongous yet lively statutes that lit up the whole place. So, in order to enjoy your soul food in your setting amongst the tranquillity of hills, you need to make a stopover here! Where: NH22, Dharampur. Meal for two: Rs 500

COLONEL'S SHAAN-E-ANGAR

When you wish to escape the mad hustle and bustle of your extravagant lifestyle and indulge into the simplicities of life, this is your place to be. Commonly referred to as the 'Colonel's Cafe' it offers you food as pure and fresh as it gets, along with being extremely delectable and gratifying. The popularity of this food joint is unknown to none. Have an amazingly hospitable and wonderfully warm experience before you head out for your further drive. Where: NH22, Dharampur. Meal for two: Rs 400

SAVOY GREEN

When you're on a family vacation, gorging on your favorite food is inevitable but its not necessary that everyone in the family will have similar tastes so instead of stopping by at a number of places, you can easily resort to Savoy Greens as its your one stop for all your favorite items, as it has different outlets, stationed at one place ranging from Chawla's typical Indian food to Baskin Robbins delectable ice-cream or scrumptious pizza joints; all in one! The scenic garden amidst the hills makes for a pleasant and a soothing vibe! SO, having something for everyone, this place makes for an idle stop. Where: NH22, Jabli. Meal for two: Rs 600

BASIL AND BEAN INN (B&B INn)

Amongst a number of places on the Chandigarh- Shimla Highway, Basil and Bean Inn stands out with an exceptionally good word of mouth. This multi-cuisine restaurant serves food with entrusted quality and enormous quantity, the wonderfully done ambience and the beautiful outdoor seating, the courteous staff that serves with warmth and hospitality, leave you with absolutely no room to complain. So, if you're one of those who are hesitant to experiment, then comfortably choose this at any given day with guaranteed no regrets. Where: Dharampur Road, Dharampur. Meal for two: Rs 1000

RASTE..ECH

When you're in the hills and experience the gushing chilly wind that makes you wanna get cozied up, nothing like literally nothing, can make it better than a plate of hot and piping maggi noodles or some delicious and fulfilling pakoras to devour on accompanied by some kadak chai and this is exactly what Raste..ech Dhaba is known for. Despite it being a small and tightly packed Dhaba, it offers an exceptional view with some appetizing home-cooked food to indulge on, all this making for a beautiful and a stupendous experience. Where: NH22, Dharampur, Solan. Meal for two: Rs400

GIANI DHABA

For hardcore non-veg lovers, Giani Dhaba is your haven in the hills. With swift service, your sinful cravings are served to you and there goes all the problems of the world *poof*. Iconic in its true sense, Giani Dhaba is well known for its endless string of loyal customers who have been gorging and devouring on their utmost favorite chicken specialties for as long as possible and there is certainly no exaggeration here! So, we suggest, do yourself a favor and make sure to stop by at the Giani Dhaba to give into your indulgences ;) Where: National Highway 22, Dharampur, Kasauli Tehsil, India Meal for two: Rs 400

APPLE CART INN

This vintage bunglow shaped hotel with widely spread out luscious and scenic garden give you all the royal and regal feels. Perfect place to get close to the bounties of nature and all the refreshing pleasures it brings along with it. Sounds like a perfect detox from the hazzle and root of our urban lifestyle, doesn't it? And the icing on the cake would be their famed palatable maggi..it's something extraordinary, we assure you! So, if you're a nature loving person and hills are your harbor, then Apple Cart Inn is your definite station to hang out at for both, a quick meal or stay over plans! Where: The Apple Cart Inn, Kiarighat, Distt. Solan Meal for two: Rs 600
